Question: For given triangle, Find the perimeter of the triangle in terms of $p$
Solution_text:
--------------------------------------SOLUTION-------------------------------------------
Formula of Perimeter = Sum of all sides of triangle
Therefore Sum of All Sides = $85$ + $85$ + $p$
Perimeter = $170$ + $p$
ThereFore Option $1$ is right selection
